caption: Relating to the purchase of or acquisition of title to real property by certain aliens or foreign entities; creating a criminal offense.
last_action: 03/14/2025 H Referred to Homeland Security, Public Safety & Veterans' Affairs: Mar 14 2025  2:42PM
summary: This bill prohibits individuals and entities from designated countries (China, Iran, North Korea, Russia) from purchasing or acquiring real property in Texas. Chinese citizens living in China cannot buy property, and violations result in divestiture and criminal penalties. Chinese-Americans and permanent residents are exempted. Companies headquartered in or controlled by designated countries are also banned. Violators face state jail felony charges and fines up to 50% of property value.
translation: 该法案禁止来自指定国家（中国、伊朗、朝鲜、俄罗斯）的个人和实体在德克萨斯州购买或获得不动产。居住在中国的中国公民不能购买房产，违者将被剥夺产权并面临刑事处罚。美籍华人和永久居民不受影响。总部设在指定国家或受指定国家控制的公司也被禁止。违法者将面临州监狱重罪指控和高达房产价值50%的罚款。
